title: RBI imposes Rs 2.68 cr penalty on UCO Bank
description: The Reserve Bank of India has levied penalties on two banks: Rs 2.68 crore on UCO Bank for violating rules on current accounts, interest on deposits, and fraud classification, and Rs 2.1 lakh on Cent Bank Home Finance Ltd for not complying with KYC regulations. These penalties underline regulatory compliance without affecting the validity of customer transactions.
